We aim to offer parents of young children help, advice, support and information on all aspects of parenting.

During the year you can enrol for example on courses about First Aid, Stress and Relaxation, Drug Abuse and computers. For your children there are soft play days, messy play days, a creche and an educational toy library.

Please check with individual centres on what they offer you. Most centres change their timetables and courses termly.

Parent's Centres also work closely with other agencies such as health visitors and Family Literacy Project.
